price: 104. Naartu waxay diiran wajiyadooda, iyagoo kuduudsan oo faruuran16.
arabic: تَلۡفَحُ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَهُمۡ فِيهَا كَٰلِحُونَ
footnotes: 16. Waxay noqon kuwo faruuran ilaa ilkuhu fool xumo muuqdaan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: talfaḥu wujūhahumu al-nāru wahum fīhā kāliḥūna
